text: ““Mbuye wanga! Ndithu ine ndaikhazika ina mwa mbumba yanga (mwana wanga Ismail) pachigwa ichi (cha Makka) chopanda zomera pa Nyumba Yanu Yopatulika (Al-Ka’ba); Mbuye wathu (aloleni) kuti akhale opemphera Swala; choncho ichiteni mitima ya anthu kukhala yopendekera kwa iwo (akonde kudzakhala malo amenewo), ndipo apatseni zipatso kuti athokoze.”
